TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".OBJVERS as OBJVERS, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CALDAY as CALDAY, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CM_CDT1 as CM_CDT1, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CM_CDT2 as CM_CDT2, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CM_CDT3 as CM_CDT3, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CM_CDT4 as CM_CDT4, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".SALESORG as SALESORG, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CM_SKU as CM_SKU, "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".CM_HIEID as CM_HIEID FROM "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU" WHERE "SAPBWP"."/BI0/PCM_SKU".OBJVERS='A'
